name: DailyValue
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily value
des:
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
When invoking Daily Value, Alexa will ask for an ingredient and a specific nutrition value by uttering:
 "{wanted value} in {ingredient}"
"ask daily value for the amount of {wanted value} in {ingredient}"
"what is the amount of {wanted value} in {ingredient}"
"how many {wanted value} in {ingredient}"
"give me the amount of {wanted value} in {ingredient}"

Alexa will return the amount of said nutrition value in 100 grams of that ingredient, either in grams or milligrams, and the percentage of it from the recommended daily value. 
The nutrition values available are:
cholesterol
sugars
calories
fiber
fat
carbs
protein
sodium
iron
potassium
magnesium
calcium
vitamin k
vitamin e
vitamin b12
vitamin c
vitamin a
folic acid
phosphorus
zinc
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
